name: Bouncy Bullets (itch) (HrishikeshS)
description:
Your objective is simple: navigate through a maze and shoot as many targets as you can! There's just one problem. When you shoot a bullet, it will bounce off the walls forever. Each newly fired bullet will be orange, and when it hits a target, it will turn blue, and only orange bullets can hit targets. Good luck!

Controls: 

  • WASD or arrows to move
  • Mouse to aim gun
  • Left Click to shoot

Music Used:

Exit the Premises by Kevin MacLeod | https://incompetech.com/

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
